opinionTexts.li: My micro-penis is a constant source of frustration; it feels inadequate, unable to fulfill any desire.
This tiny thing is utterly useless, shriveled and pathetic, mocking my deepest sexual needs.
How can I ever satisfy anyone with this? Its miniature size fills me with profound despair and anger.
A truly pathetic excuse for a penis, barely noticeable, leaving me perpetually unfulfilled and agitated.
The sight of my own micro-penis only deepens my overwhelming sexual frustration. It's a cruel joke.
Small and limp, it's a constant reminder of my unfulfilled desires. My mood sours every time I see it.
